iati-activity.title: WaterAid India
iati-activity.description: WaterAid has been working in India since 1986 and now works in ten states, providing access to water and sanitation in both rural and urban areas. Our work has shifted from its traditional focus in Southern India to vulnerable northern communities, meaning that our presence is now national in scope.
iati-activity.participating-org: Shibpur Association for Technological Humanitarian and Environmental Endeavours
Society For Social Unity and Development
iati-activity.activity-date: Financial year that WaterAid (re)started activities within the country

contact-info.mailing-address: Open data at WaterAid, 47-49 Durham Street, London, SE11 5JD, UK

budget.period-start: Forward looking data for WaterAid's 2012-2013 financial year (1st April to 31st March) are drawn from WaterAid's approved aspirational budgets and are estimates as at March 2013. The actual figures achieved will vary depending on a range of factors including the securing of the funding needed, challenges faced in the countries, etc.
budget.period-end: End of WaterAid 2012-13 financial year (1st April to 31st March)

budget.period-start: Forward looking data for WaterAid's 2013-2014 financial year (1st April to 31st March) are drawn from WaterAid's approved aspirational budgets and are estimates as at March 2013. The actual figures achieved will vary depending on a range of factors including the securing of the funding needed, challenges faced in the countries, etc.
budget.period-end: End of WaterAid 2013-14 financial year (1st April to 31st March)

budget.period-start: Forward looking data for WaterAid's 2014-2015 financial year (1st April to 31st March) are drawn from WaterAid's approved aspirational budgets and are estimates as at March 2014. The actual figures achieved will vary depending on a range of factors including the securing of the funding needed, challenges faced in the countries, etc.
budget.period-end: End of WaterAid 2014-15 financial year (1st April to 31st March)
